```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```


```{r report-setup}
## Load the package
library(getTBinR)

## Get the data
tb <- get_tb_burden()

## Get the data dictionary
dict <- get_data_dict()
```

```{r}
country <- "United Kingdom"

sum_uk_inc <- summarise_tb_burden(countries = country,
                                  compare_to_world = TRUE, 
                                  compare_to_region = TRUE,
                                  annual_change = FALSE)
```


```{r}
sum_uk_inc %>% 
  ggplot(aes(year, e_inc_100k, col = area)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
